attributes.title: What Fuels You? And What Is The Best Fuel For Your Life?
attributes.description:
13 MAY 2020
*PARAMASHIVA’S DIRECT MESSAGE FROM SHRIKAILASA:

*PURIFYING THE SOURCE OF YOUR ENERGY - “PRANA” - LIFE FORCE, IS THE GOAL OF HUMAN BODY. 

*YOU USE SOME FORM OF FUEL TO EMPOWER YOU, TO MAKE YOU ACTIVE, ALIVE, FRESH, EXCITED. SOME PEOPLE GET IGNITED, EXCITED WITH SEX, LUST, FASHION. SOME PEOPLE GET IGNITED, EXCITED, ACTIVE WITH ANGER, REVENGE, HOLDING GRUDGE. SOME PEOPLE GET EXCITED, INSPIRED, ACTIVE THROUGH DEVOTION, FEELING CONNECTION, POWERFUL TRUTHS, EMPOWERING, ENLIGHTENING COGNITIONS, ACTIVITIES LIKE YOGA, KRIYA, PUJA. 

*PURIFYING AND RAISING THE QUALITY  OF YOUR FUEL RAISES YOUR STATE, SPACE, POWERS OF PARAMASHIVA. 

*RAISE THE QUALITY OF YOUR FUEL, MOVE AWAY FROM SEX, AWAY FROM ANGER, AWAY FROM REVENGE, AWAY FROM HOLDING GRUDGE, AWAY FROM ALL OF THIS TAMASIC, RAJASIC, FUELS AND RESOURCES, AND MOVE TOWARDS INTENSE LIFE POSITIVE EMPOWERING FUEL. 

*THE HIGHEST LIFE-POSITIVE FUEL IS TYAGA - THE SOURCE OF PRANA IN KAILASA! 

*EVERY TIME I ATTEND TO MY KIDS AND ANSWER THEIR QUESTIONS, WHEN I HELP THEM TO GET ENLIGHTENED AND MANIFEST POWERS, I FEEL SO MUCH PRANA, ENERGY! IT IS NOT THAT I WANT THEM TO GET INTO MOOD SWINGS AND THROW TANTRUMS SO I CAN ATTEND TO THEM AND GET ENERGY! I WANT TO MAKE IT CLEAR! OTHERWISE THESE KIDS WILL SAY, ‘WE HAVE TO THROW TANTRUMS TO GIVE ENERGY TO SWAMIJI!’ NO! 

*WHENEVER I DO TYAGA, I FEEL SO EXCITED!

*ONE OF MY KIDS ASKED, ‘SWAMIJI YOU SAID: INVOKE PARAMASHIVA LIKE A REQUEST AND HE WILL MANIFEST. BUT I READ IN THE STORIES, HE GIVES HARD TESTS AND IT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO PROVE AND SUCCEED IN THOSE TESTS.’ 

*HE TESTS ONLY DURING THE CONCLUSION MOMENT JUST BEFORE GIVING ENLIGHTENMENT! ACTUALLY I WILL TELL YOU THE EXACT MANUAL, INSIDERS’ SECRET: HE MAKES YOU GOLD. HE TESTS YOUR CARAT TO DECLARE IT TO THE WORLD, NOT FOR HIM TO KNOW OR TO JUDGE YOU! HE TESTS THE CARAT OF YOUR GOLD IN PUBLIC FOR THE WORLD TO KNOW, NOT FOR HIMSELF, NOT THAT HE DOUBTS YOU. HE WANTS THE WORLD TO KNOW WHAT KIND OF A METAL YOU ARE NOW! 

*IF YOUR READ NAYAMARS’ LIVES, THEY WILL DESCRIBE VERY CLEARLY: PARAMASHIVA DECIDED TO TEST ILAYANGUDI NAYANAR TO SHOW TO THE WORLD NOT FOR HIMSELF. AS IF PARAMASHIVA DOES NOT KNOW THE STRENGTH AND METAL OUT OF WHICH ILAYANGUDI NAYANAR WAS MADE OF! HE ONLY MADE HIM OUT OF THAT METAL!

*RAISING THE QUALITY OF THE FUEL OF YOUR PRANA, YOUR LIFE FORCE, IS THE PURPOSE OF HUMAN BODY.

*SOME PEOPLE GET EXCITED FOR MONEY. FOR THEM MONEY IS PRANA. SOME GET EXCITED BY ABUSING AND ATTACKING AND DESTROYING OTHERS. IF THIS MAKES YOU EXCITED, YOU ARE A CHANDALA, RAKSHASA, DEMON. IF PLEASURES OF LIFE LIKE SEX, FOOD EXCITES YOU, THEN YOU ARE SHUDRA. IF MONEY EXCITES YOU, YOU ARE VAISHYA. IF COMMANDING, RULING, ADMINISTERING EXCITES YOU, YOU ARE KSHATRIYA. IF ENLIGHTENMENT, POWERFUL COGNITIONS ABOUT COSMOS, KUNDALINI SHAKTI, YOGA, PUJA, KRIYA, EXCITES YOU, YOU ARE BRAHMINA.

*YOUR FUEL DECIDES YOUR VARNA. 

*TODAY, FORMALLY I AM INAUGURATING THE “GLOBAL AKANDA NIRVIKALPA SAMADHI JNANA YAJNA” TO GIVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO THE WHOLE UNIVERSE AND TO HEAL THE WORLD FROM COVID 19 AND ITS DIRECT AND INDIRECT EFFECTS.

*12 ZONES FROM AROUND THE WORLD FROM 100 COUNTRIES WILL CONTINUOUSLY RADIATE THE SPACE OF PARAMASHIVA BY PRACTISING NIRVIKALPA SAMADHI - UNCLUTCHING PROCESS MEDITATION, 24 HOURS A DAY, 7 DAYS A WEEK, STARTING NOW.

*THE GOAL IS TO HAVE 10,000 PEOPLE RADIATE PARAMASHIVA FROM THE SPACE OF NIRVIKALPA SAMADHI AT ANY POINT IN TIME TO GIVE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH TO THE ENTIRE WORLD AND HEAL COVID 19. 

*EVEN PEOPLE WITH NO MEDITATION EXPERIENCE ARE WELCOME. WE WILL TEACH AND TRAIN YOU IN THE SACRED UNCLUTCHING AND AKANDA NIRVIKALPA SAMADHI JNANA YAJNA PROCESS - THE ULTIMATE MEDITATION REVEALED BY PARAMASHIVA, AND HE WILL ENLIGHTEN YOU. SIGN UP AT HTTP://KAILAASA.TV/MINUTES4PEACE/.

*IF YOU PRACTISE BY YOURSELF, IF YOU PUT ONE HOUR EFFORT, YOU WILL GET ONE HOUR RESULT.  BUT HERE, EVERY SINGLE INDIVIDUAL WHO PUTS ONE HOUR WILL RECEIVE THE BENEFIT OF THE COLLECTIVE BILLION HOURS! THAT IS THE BENEFIT OF THE COLLECTIVE SPIRITUAL ALCHEMY PROCESS. YOU WILL NOT ONLY GET THE BILLION HOURS, I AM ADDING THE DIRECT PARAMASHIVA COMPONENT IN IT, SO IT BECOMES LIKE A TRANSFORMER - BECOMING TRILLIONS AND TRILLIONS, AND YOU WILL BE SHOWERED!
